00018 const UINT32 DriverStation::kBatteryChannel;
00019 const UINT32 DriverStation::kJoystickPorts;

00030 DriverStation::DriverStation()
00031     : m_controlData (NULL)
00032     , m_digitalOut (0)
00033     , m_batteryChannel (NULL)
00034     , m_statusDataSemaphore (semMCreate(SEM_Q_PRIORITY | SEM_DELETE_SAFE | SEM_INVERSION_SAFE))
00035     , m_task ("DriverStation", (FUNCPTR)DriverStation::InitTask)
00036     , m_dashboardHigh(m_statusDataSemaphore)
00037     , m_dashboardLow(m_statusDataSemaphore)
00038     , m_dashboardInUseHigh(&m_dashboardHigh)
00039     , m_dashboardInUseLow(&m_dashboardLow)
00040     , m_newControlData (false)
00041     , m_packetDataAvailableSem (0)
00042     , m_enhancedIO()
00043 {
00044     // Create a new semaphore
00045     m_packetDataAvailableSem = semBCreate (SEM_Q_PRIORITY, SEM_EMPTY);
00046 
00047     // Register that semaphore with the network communications task.
00048     // It will signal when new packet data is available. 
00049     setNewDataSem(m_packetDataAvailableSem);
00050 
00051     m_controlData = new FRCCommonControlData;
00052 
00053     // initialize packet number and control words to zero;
00054     m_controlData->packetIndex = 0;
00055     m_controlData->control = 0;
00056 
00057     // set all joystick axis values to neutral; buttons to OFF
00058     m_controlData->stick0Axis1 = m_controlData->stick0Axis2 = m_controlData->stick0Axis3 = 0;
00059     m_controlData->stick1Axis1 = m_controlData->stick1Axis2 = m_controlData->stick1Axis3 = 0;
00060     m_controlData->stick2Axis1 = m_controlData->stick2Axis2 = m_controlData->stick2Axis3 = 0;
00061     m_controlData->stick3Axis1 = m_controlData->stick3Axis2 = m_controlData->stick3Axis3 = 0;
00062     m_controlData->stick0Axis4 = m_controlData->stick0Axis5 = m_controlData->stick0Axis6 = 0;
00063     m_controlData->stick1Axis4 = m_controlData->stick1Axis5 = m_controlData->stick1Axis6 = 0;
00064     m_controlData->stick2Axis4 = m_controlData->stick2Axis5 = m_controlData->stick2Axis6 = 0;
00065     m_controlData->stick3Axis4 = m_controlData->stick3Axis5 = m_controlData->stick3Axis6 = 0;
00066     m_controlData->stick0Buttons = 0;
00067     m_controlData->stick1Buttons = 0;
00068     m_controlData->stick2Buttons = 0;
00069     m_controlData->stick3Buttons = 0;
00070 
00071     // initialize the analog and digital data.
00072     m_controlData->analog1 = 0;
00073     m_controlData->analog2 = 0;
00074     m_controlData->analog3 = 0;
00075     m_controlData->analog4 = 0;
00076     m_controlData->dsDigitalIn = 0;
00077 
00078     m_batteryChannel = new AnalogChannel(kBatterySlot, kBatteryChannel);
00079 
00080     AddToSingletonList();
00081 
00082     if (!m_task.Start((INT32)this))
00083     {
00084         wpi_fatal(DriverStationTaskError);
00085     }
00086 }
00087 
00088 DriverStation::~DriverStation()
00089 {
00090     m_task.Stop();
00091     semDelete(m_statusDataSemaphore);
00092     delete m_batteryChannel;
00093     delete m_controlData;
00094     m_instance = NULL;
00095     // Unregister our semaphore.
00096     setNewDataSem(0);
00097     semDelete(m_packetDataAvailableSem);
00098 }
00099 
00100 void DriverStation::InitTask(DriverStation *ds)
00101 {
00102     ds->Run();
00103 }
00104 
00105 void DriverStation::Run()
00106 {
00107     int period = 0;
00108     while (true)
00109     {
00110         semTake(m_packetDataAvailableSem, WAIT_FOREVER);
00111         SetData();
00112         m_enhancedIO.UpdateData();
00113         GetData();
00114         if (++period >= 4)
00115         {
00116             MotorSafetyHelper::CheckMotors();
00117             period = 0;
00118         }
00119     }
00120 }
00121 
00125 DriverStation* DriverStation::GetInstance()
00126 {
00127     if (m_instance == NULL)
00128     {
00129         m_instance = new DriverStation();
00130     }
00131     return m_instance;
00132 }
00133 
00139 void DriverStation::GetData()
00140 {
00141     getCommonControlData(m_controlData, WAIT_FOREVER);
00142     m_newControlData = true;
00143 }
00144 
00148 void DriverStation::SetData()
00149 {
00150     char *userStatusDataHigh;
00151     INT32 userStatusDataHighSize;
00152     char *userStatusDataLow;
00153     INT32 userStatusDataLowSize;
00154 
00155     Synchronized sync(m_statusDataSemaphore);
00156 
00157     m_dashboardInUseHigh->GetStatusBuffer(&userStatusDataHigh, &userStatusDataHighSize);
00158     m_dashboardInUseLow->GetStatusBuffer(&userStatusDataLow, &userStatusDataLowSize);
00159     setStatusData(GetBatteryVoltage(), m_digitalOut, m_updateNumber,
00160         userStatusDataHigh, userStatusDataHighSize, userStatusDataLow, userStatusDataLowSize, WAIT_FOREVER);
00161     
00162     m_dashboardInUseHigh->Flush();
00163     m_dashboardInUseLow->Flush();
00164 }
00165 
00174 float DriverStation::GetBatteryVoltage()
00175 {
00176     wpi_assert(m_batteryChannel != NULL);
00177 
00178     // The Analog bumper has a voltage divider on the battery source.
00179     // Vbatt *--/\/\/\--* Vsample *--/\/\/\--* Gnd
00180     //         680 Ohms            1000 Ohms
00181     return m_batteryChannel->GetAverageVoltage() * (1680.0 / 1000.0);
00182 }
00183 
00192 float DriverStation::GetStickAxis(UINT32 stick, UINT32 axis)
00193 {
00194     if (axis < 1 || axis > kJoystickAxes)
00195     {
00196         wpi_fatal(BadJoystickAxis);
00197         return 0.0;
00198     }
00199 
00200     INT8 value;
00201     switch (stick)
00202     {
00203         case 1:
00204             value = m_controlData->stick0Axes[axis-1];
00205             break;
00206         case 2:
00207             value = m_controlData->stick1Axes[axis-1];
00208             break;
00209         case 3:
00210             value = m_controlData->stick2Axes[axis-1];
00211             break;
00212         case 4:
00213             value = m_controlData->stick3Axes[axis-1];
00214             break;
00215         default:
00216             wpi_fatal(BadJoystickIndex);
00217             return 0.0;
00218     }
00219     
00220     float result;
00221     if (value < 0)
00222         result = ((float) value) / 128.0;
00223     else
00224         result = ((float) value) / 127.0;
00225     wpi_assert(result <= 1.0 && result >= -1.0);
00226     if (result > 1.0)
00227         result = 1.0;
00228     else if (result < -1.0)
00229         result = -1.0;
00230     return result;
00231 }
00232 
00240 short DriverStation::GetStickButtons(UINT32 stick)
00241 {
00242     wpi_assert ((stick >= 1) && (stick <= 4));
00243     switch (stick)
00244     {
00245     case 1:
00246         return m_controlData->stick0Buttons;
00247     case 2:
00248         return m_controlData->stick1Buttons;
00249     case 3:
00250         return m_controlData->stick2Buttons;
00251     case 4:
00252         return m_controlData->stick3Buttons;
00253     }
00254     return 0;
00255 }
00256 
00257 // 5V divided by 10 bits
00258 #define kDSAnalogInScaling ((float)(5.0 / 1023.0))
00259 
00269 float DriverStation::GetAnalogIn(UINT32 channel)
00270 {
00271     wpi_assert ((channel >= 1) && (channel <= 4));
00272     switch (channel)
00273     {
00274     case 1:
00275         return kDSAnalogInScaling * m_controlData->analog1;
00276     case 2:
00277         return kDSAnalogInScaling * m_controlData->analog2;
00278     case 3:
00279         return kDSAnalogInScaling * m_controlData->analog3;
00280     case 4:
00281         return kDSAnalogInScaling * m_controlData->analog4;
00282     }
00283     return 0.0;
00284 }
00285 
00292 bool DriverStation::GetDigitalIn(UINT32 channel)
00293 {
00294     wpi_assert ((channel >= 1) && (channel <= 8));
00295     return ((m_controlData->dsDigitalIn >> (channel-1)) & 0x1) ? true : false;
00296 }
00297 
00307 void DriverStation::SetDigitalOut(UINT32 channel, bool value) 
00308 {
00309     wpi_assert ((channel >= 1) && (channel <= 8));
00310     m_digitalOut &= ~(0x1 << (channel-1));
00311     m_digitalOut |= ((UINT8)value << (channel-1));
00312 }
00313 
00319 bool DriverStation::GetDigitalOut(UINT32 channel) 
00320 {
00321     wpi_assert ((channel >= 1) && (channel <= 8));
00322     return ((m_digitalOut >> (channel-1)) & 0x1) ? true : false;;
00323 }

00349 bool DriverStation::IsNewControlData()
00350 {

00352     m_newControlData = false;

00371 UINT32 DriverStation::GetPacketNumber()

00376 
00377 DriverStation::Alliance DriverStation::GetAlliance()
00378 {
00379     if (m_controlData->dsID_Alliance == 'R') return kRed;
00380     if (m_controlData->dsID_Alliance == 'B') return kBlue;
00381     wpi_assert(false);
00382     return kInvalid;
00383 }
00384 
00385 UINT32 DriverStation::GetLocation()
00386 {
00387     wpi_assert ((m_controlData->dsID_Position >= '1') && (m_controlData->dsID_Position <= '3'));
00388     return m_controlData->dsID_Position - '0';
00389 }
